title: What a day to be a Nami main...
body:
or draven main, or raka main or fiizz or ahrii main...

Meanwhile I am stuck being a Cassiopeia main and not recieving any skins... since I started playing league (end season 3)  I have never seen a new skin from my main (cass) like, i do not know the feeling of receiving a new brand cool baddass-looking skin for your main. Like, how much do I have to wait to feel that? 

give an upvote if you feel like your champ has been neglated (come on all yorick, malza, swain...)

replies.body: Several of those champions received skins already compared to Cass and Swain, those are the only ones who've been waiting for a considerable time now.

Most of these that did, however, were skins 750 RP collection skins that attempted to appease their need for skins with a quick and easy fix (Guardian of the Sands Rammus, King of Clubs Morde, etc.). Some of us waited years for skins like these, and we, for the most part, were largely disappointed. However, for Malz, Cass, and Swain, they haven't made an effort - not even a half-assed one.
What? Malzahar already received an amazing skin back in 2015 known as Snow Day Malzahar which is at least on the same level as 1350 RP skin.
i main {{champion:6}} , i feel ya bro

{{champion:67}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:37}} B-but we don't have enough skins though!

/ sarcasm

Meanwhile, Gnar has gotten a skin like, every 3 months since last autumn. . .

Gentlemen, Snow Day, El León, and knowing his track record, he'll get a Pool Party skin or a Harrowing one soon.

Your right... Swain hasn't got a skin for 4 years, coming up on 5 because he's not getting a VU this year for sure. I think its Vi or Nami has more skins then him and is MUCH, MUCH, newer. Swain has so many awsome concepts too!

Even as a Mordekaiser main, I was sad when a skin I waited almost 4 years for was a 750 rp dud (to soon be followed by a weird rework nobody asked for). We outer margin champion fans have it rough.

I also play a lot of Urgot, Viktor, and other rare champs who have waited patiently for awesome skins (where is my Disco Lord Viktor?). I hope when these champs finally get skins, they're worth the Wait.
To be honest I main support and play {{champion:37}} a lot and even i was pissed when she got a heartseeker skin. Like focus on someone else she has enough skins now

Swain Main...

I play cass too
Well, I main {{champion:99}} and starting to main {{champion:203}} again.  But, I would like to see a new {{champion:78}} skin.

Yeah I never see Varus or Thresh skins...
O wait....

Sorry guys...
Best of luck!

I don't play him but yorick hasnt actually gotten a skin since his release. Like not even while he was a newer champ, now riot just uses the excuse of he's getting reworked so they don't want to release a skin before hand.
Hopefully she'll start getting some if their happy with her rework, meanwhile Swain's still on the Full Rework list...
